bibl.title: Letter from F. Marti Ibanez to Philip Showalter Hench, November 10, 1944

div1.p: Ibanez sends copies of "Horizontes Medicos," containing the article on Building No. 1 of Camp Lazear, to Hench.

div1.head: Letter from F. Marti Ibanez to Philip Showalter Hench, November 10, 1944
div1.opener:
WINTHROP PRODUCTS INC.
Pharmaceuticals Developed by Science and Dedicated to the Physician
350 HUDSON STREET
NEW YORK 14, NEW YORK
N
W WINTHROP E
S
November 10, 1944
Lt. Col. Philip S. Hench
Medical Corps. U.S.A.
Army and Navy Hospital
Hot Springs, Arkansas
Dear Sir:
div1.p:
In compliance with Mr. Hart's request we are sending you
herewith 6 copies of the Cuban Horizontes Médicos - No. 6-
June 1944 containing the article on Building No. 1 of Camp
Lazear.

Hoping that this literature reaches you without any
delay, we are
div1.closer:
Yours very truly, WINTHROP PRODUCTS INC.
Dr. F. Martin Ibañez
Medical Director DR. FMI/rb/11
ENCL. 6
P. O. BOX 90 CANAL STREET STATION
CABLE ADDRESS “WINCOX”
